item.description:
How to find us
"AT THE BORDER to the LARGE flower garden ,ORANGE POLE w/ Slow OLD kids at PLAY"

About Pandemonium
Pandemonium is a four piece band that's been entertaining crowds all over the Tri-State area since 2001. Performing at night clubs, colleges, casinos, ski lodges, corporate parties, fund raisers, festivals, weddings...you name it, they've played it. With a library of literally hundreds of songs, PDM can cover anything from Jackson 5 to Bon Jovi, Blondie to No Doubt, The Beatles to AC/DC, Katrina and the Waves to Kelly Clarkson...Guns & Roses, Green Day, Poison, Blink 182, Van Halen...old...new...basically ANYTHING that people can sing along with and jam to. For latest schedule and news updates, visit: www.pdmrocks.com.

The Park:
Its also good to make food right there on site if you dont cause any trouble, and i usually bring the grillo to this spot for some cooking something.
its available for others in the group too..
I do what i can to keep people from complaining by having the grill in our immediate area and keep it away from the crowd.

Bring your chairs, blankets, bug spray, food and your own favourite Adult bugg juice, a lot of us share our stuff with the others so offer some to your fellow attendees too.

WE WILL BE IN THE GENERAL AREA OF THE rOSE gARDEN bORDER...BUT STILL IN VIEW OF THE PERFORMERS YET BUT BACK ENOUGH SO WE CAN CONVERSE AND MOVE AROUND FREELY..

LOOK FOR THE ORANGE POLE and THE yellow "SLOW OLD kids at PLAY sign

Getting There:

Elizabeth Park is located at the corner of Prospect Avenue and Asylum Avenue on the Hartford / West Hartford line.

I-84 West bound to Exit 48 (Asylum Street).

Stay to the Right on Asylum.

Follow for approximately 1.8 miles.

Turn left into the park (1555 Asylum Avenue, West Hartford). 06117

Park where you see it, its not that bad. but you may have to look a bit if you are late..


I-84 East bound to Exit 44 (Prospect Ave)

Straight thru stop sign.

Left at light onto Prospect.

Follow approximately 1.8 miles.

Entrance on Left (915 Prospect, Hartford)

Park where you find a place.

http://www.elizabethp...
see you there
item.how_to_find_us: we will join the outdoor concert group

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Pandemonium at Elizabeth Park tonight
